SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Main
Main class for the blog application.
MenuView
The MenuView class is responsible for displaying menus to the user.
Post
The Post class represents a blog post with a title, author, and content.
PostController
The PostController class manages the interaction between the user and the blog's model (PostRepository) and views (PostView and MenuView).
PostNotFoundException
The PostNotFoundException class is a custom exception that is thrown when a requested post cannot be found in the PostRepository.
PostRepository
The PostRepository class is responsible for managing a collection of blog posts.
PostView
The PostView class is responsible for interacting with the user, allowing them to view, add, modify, and delete posts.
